== Service Record doesn't match the ship's history ==
How can this ship have been sunk on June 25, 1942 and then participate in the Battle of the Santa Cruz Islands (October) and the Battle of Guadalcanal (November)? I'm removing the battles. If this ship did in fact participate in them and was sunk on a different date, please correct this page with a source. [[User:Lukini|<font style="color:#000;text-shadow:0 0 5px #222">lukini</font>]] ([[User Talk:Lukini|talk]] | [[Special:Contributions/Lukini|contribs]]) 18:06, 3 April 2013 (UTC)
